definitions.definition: A book containing common phrases in two or more languages, used to learn a foreign language.
A usually pocket-sized book consisting of everyday expressions and vocabulary in two languages and intended for travellers who wish to communicate with locals while in other countries.

main_definition: A book containing common phrases in two or more languages, used to learn a foreign language.
secondary_definitions: A usually pocket-sized book consisting of everyday expressions and vocabulary in two languages and intended for travellers who wish to communicate with locals while in other countries.
